power.name: Charge
power.text: Tilt your character card (to indicate it is charged). Draw a card.

power.name: Discharge
power.text: Un-tilt your character card. Play a card.

ul.li: One player may play a card now.
Deal 2 lightning damage to a target
One player may search their trash for an Equipment card and put it in their hand.

card.name: Strength
card.text: Deal 3 melee damage to a target. If Battery is charged, deal 2 melee damage to the same target

card.name: Knock 'em Down
card.text: Deal 2 melee damage to a non-hero target. If Battery is charged, deal 2 melee damage to all non-hero targets

card.name: Shock and Awe
card.text: Deal 2 lightning damage to a target. If Battery is charged, deal 3 lightning damage to up to 3 additional targets

card.name: Knockout Punch
card.text: Deal 2 lightning damage to a target. If Battery is charged, you deal damage in this way, and the target is not a character card, treat that target as if it had no card text until your next turn

card.name: Pushing the Limits
card.text: If Battery is charged, play 2 cards. If Battery is not charged, draw 3 cards.

card.name: ...then Pushing it Beyond
card.text: When you play this card, Battery deals herself 3 psychic damage. You may play a card. You may use a power.

card.name: Pow!
card.text: Select a non-hero target. If Battery is charged and the target is not a character card,put it on top of its deck and then deal 3 melee damage to a non-hero target. Otherwise, deal 2 melee damage to that target

card.name: Cool Toys
card.text: Deal X lightning damage to a target, where X = the number of equipment and device cards in play. If Battery is charged, you may destroy an equipment or device card

card.name: Rapid Recon
card.text:
If Battery is not charged, all heroes may draw a card.
Draw a card. Play a card

card.name: No Time to Rest
card.text: When you destroy a target, you may draw a card and you may play a card

card.name: Magnetism
card.power: If Battery is charged, destroy an equipment or device card. If Battery is not charged, choose an equipment card from a hero's trash and put it into play

card.name: Static Charge
card.text: At the start of your turn, if Battery has used her Discharge power since the start of your last turn, deal 2 lightning damage to all non-hero targets

card.name: Glowing Threads
card.text: When Battery uses her Discharge power reduce damage dealt to her by 2 until the start of her next turn
